content:
1. Rohit Sharma (Right-handed opener)
2. Shubman Gill (Right-handed opener)
3. Virat Kohli (Right-handed middle order batsman)
4. Shreyas Iyer (Right-handed middle order batsman)
5. Hardik Pandya (Right-handed all-rounder)
6. KL Rahul (Right-handed middle order batsman)
7. Ravindra Jadeja (Left-handed all-rounder)
8. Mohammed Shami (Right-arm fast bowler)
9. Jasprit Bumrah (Right-arm fast bowler)
10. Kuldeep Yadav (Left-arm Chinaman bowler)
11. Shardul Thakur (Right-arm fast bowler)

I've made the required adjustments. Suryakumar Yadav is right handed batsman, my apologies for the error. T Natarajan is not available for the tournament, so I have replaced him with Shardul Thakur, who is a right-arm fast bowler and have a good experience in the Indian cricket team. This team will have a good balance of right and left handed batsmen, and good variety in the bowling attack, with both pace and spin options.
